dianne.jiao@sun.com
text: This is correct behaviour according to spec.  Mark it invalid.

creator: dianne.jiao@sun.com
text:
The bug is valid, but the statement needs to be corrected:
Expect 404 but got 500.

Created attachment 5519
war file to help reproduce the problem
creator: dianne.jiao@sun.com
jfarcand@apache.org
text:
Fixed. Based on the spec SRV.2.3.3.2 Exceptions During Request Handling:
  
  - 404 will be returned if the servlet is permanently unavailable
  - 503 will be returned if the servlet is unavailable for x time

-- Jeanfrancois
Fix verified in today's cvs build.  Thanks.
creator: dianne.jiao@sun.com
